Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Young investor will take a lesson, whole ICO marke is 80-99% down comparing to last December, besides Gladius is different.  @Rodd66 Go away Mr. Bot-Robot  From discord:  Quote Good morning guys! :sunny:Ô∏è:sunny:Ô∏è:sunny:Ô∏è  A lazy Sunday morning here in Durban South Africa.  The BETA testing has been paramount to the overall success of the platform progress thus far. The payment system, we now realise, is probably one of the most important parts in the development of the platform, which will also need extensive testing in BETA to insure, things run exactly according to plan. We did not realise this at first, but this is why it's called BETA testing.  The last part of the development will therefore be integrating this payment system into the platform. We have looked at this carefully, there is no other efficient way to do this.  Therefore, and we only can estimate at this point in time, is that the payment system, which will include KYC etc. Will only be completed last which will probably be in February or March 2019.  Have an awesome Sunday!!

Author: luzakos_yex
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Because you dont know where to search ,  Open Beta is live now, people are raising bugs(Win,OS,Linux) team is fixing them and implementing features(KYC+rewards system). Actually network has more than 500 nodes online! Within months this project will be huge!  Latest update: Quote Public BETA Update! üåü  1. Latest release is 0.6.2 - Found here https://github.com/gladiusio/gladius-node/releases 2. From the development side. We are full steam ahead! The feedback from the BETA testers has been awesome! Truth is we have had such good feedback from you guys, we need time to catch up before taking on new BETA testers. 3. We have decided to not caste in stone an exact end date to the public BETA. Truth be said. Its not possible until such time as we uncover all the issues 100%. This means BETA testing may end in October, November, December or even January! If we had a crystal ball, be able to "see" into the future then yes an exact date would be possible. 4. As a result of the above. We will be completing the KYC and BETA reward...."as we go along". Therefore once a "tester"has completed the 72 continuous hours we will be awarding them the reward as we progress after completing a KYC (hope to have KYC prepared next week). 5. Also as a result of this awesome feedback, we will only be supplying referral links as and when we are ready to take on board more BETA testers. 6. Discord is the communities choice. Boaz (@borgqueenx) an awesome part now of our community is helping us prepare this. Thanks Boaz!!!  This is honestly going a LOT better than we originally anticipated. Thank-you guys!

Author: IeSua
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Did everyone get an email?  Please upload proof of address We need to ask for a proof of residence to confirm your address. It needs to have both your full name and your address printed on it. Please login to dashboard to submit this document.  Thank you for participating in the Gladius Airdrop. We need to ask for a proof of residence to confirm your address. It needs to have both your full name and your address printed on it. A valid document can be: Your utility bill - Gas, Electric, Phone (We cannot accept mobile phone bills) Your bank or credit card statement (You must send a photo of a physical letter or copy of your statement) Your council tax bill, or a HMRC notification Your vehicle registration or tax You have until the 10th of May Midnight Eastern Standard Time to submit this document. If you login to your account it will indicate for you whether or not your KYC was successful or not. This may take up to few days to be processed so please be patient. We will only allow you to complete one KYC attempt. Please insure you provide accurate information to insure you are not rejected.  Is that all to get the f###ing airdrop? Are you sick, crazy or ate a lot of mushrooms? The level of verification is higher than on some exchanges. Or learn how to make normal airdrops or do not do them at all.

Thus, these protection pools will give protection and helps to speed your content. Gladius allows everyone to protect and allows them to speed up their website. Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Those who took part in Airdprop - need to complete KYC now   KYC is open now      Thank you for participating in the Gladius Airdrop. This is now complete. You achieved a RANK 3     As we have more than 40 thousand participants we will only allow you to complete one KYC attempt. Please insure you provide accurate information to insure you are not rejected.     You have until the 10th of April Midnight Eastern Standard Time to complete the KYC process. If you login to your account it will indicate for you whether or not your KYC was successful or not. This may take up to 7 days to be processed so please be patient.     All token rewards will be transferred to the ether wallet you provide no later than the 21st of April 2018. Please be aware that it is not possible under any circumstances to change this wallet address once submitted.     VERY IMPORTANT - participants who use the main Gladius chat to discuss the AIRDROP will be warned once not to. If they persist to use this method they will be banned from the chat and automatically disqualified from the AIRDROP.

Check it out here: https://medium.com/@gladiusio/gladius-development-update-5-03-01-89a154ff4c  And hello newcomers, welcome to Gladius!  Official airdrop announcement here: https://medium.com/@gladiusio/gladius-airdrop-learn-about-gladius-78a03e9034df  IMPORTANT: In order to receive the tokens - you will have to go through KYC. we will start the KYC process soon.  For the AIRDROP event, follow the below instructions  1) Go to airdrop.gladius.io 2) Join @GladiusChannelBot 3) type /start 4) type /join 5) follow instructions 6) complete tasks for points/ranks  BOT COMMANDS DO NOT WORK ON THIS CHANNEL! üìå Please just do a little reading and follow instructions. It isn't that hard. This isn't ending soon so no rush. Take your time. If after following directions you still have questions ask... üìå  Frequently asked questions: 1) My verification mail isn't coming in!  - Due to the huge influx of members registering for this event, this may take a while to reach you please hold on. Make sure to check your spam folder too. 2) airdrop telegram username not found  - Go to settings on your telegram account. Click "username" add one. 3) I cannot see my upload speed. This cannot be done from a phone with data. It needs to be connected to a stable wifi fixed connection. 4) My share only has 1/11 after sharing on multiple platform  - Use the share button. You need to get users to sign up using another referral link. 5) How many GLAs will we receive for the points we are awarded? - The final pool of tokens that will be given will be announced by the end of the presale period. 6) when will the airdrop activity end? - The airdrop will continue until March 31st.

Author: Tipstar
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: According to their roadmap, the product should get it's shape by march 2018 while their finalized commercial product would be launched by the august of this year.  Quote PHASE 1 - ETA MARCH 2018 The goal of this stage is to complete a working first iteration of a complete CDN and DDoS protection network capable of handling several Gbs of connections per second. This will include multi-level protection and a private rollout to select partnered websites.  Quote PHASE 2 - ETA AUGUST 2018 The goal of this stage is to completely finalize the network so that it will be commercially viable on a large scale. This means that we will have a network large enough to take on hundreds, if not thousands, of websites. Additionally we will potentially allow for more pools to be created, each being rated and validated to ensure they are performing up to standards.

Gladius is just trying to be ready for any new regulations that might come up! They havent taken your tokens or sold that information!  To all the bounty hunters, Do not register on a bounty if you do not have fully trust on a campaign. You make others look bad with your crying for a trivial issue. Author: ManoMAB
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Paccoin almost died a year after launch , website got updated 2years ago explorer died under the blockchain weight . After a year of people asking wmcorless  to show a sings of life some people just took it upon them self's to make pacc great again. Some started running there own block explorer made there own website contacted coinmarketcap and exchanges.  Somewhere along the way wmcorless  showed up and after a short time of differences of opinions he saw al the work we where doing as volunteers and decided to work with us and hand most of it over to the community. So its kind of grassroots , at the moment some are doing most of the lifting on development there are a lot of people working  together on paccoin .    I think any one willing is welcome to help out. There's a lot of info on the history of paccoin on right here on the 48 bitcointalk pages , also  https://paccoin.net/category/paccoin-weekly-blog/page/2 https://paccoin.net/category/paccoin-weekly-blog  and then join us on discort https://discord.gg/NtYWUR  just read up on the history off paccoin     Discord Group for PUMP Warning! https://discord.gg/SJe2XN

Author: Silber
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: The Price of the Gladius Token will be very volatile, if there ist not a equilibrium of Computers with the Gladius App and Websites who use Gladius for DDoS Protection:  If there are more Computer who runs Gladius App than Websites who require the Gladius Token, the price goes down. Because the demand for the Gladius Token is lower than the offer. Ant of course the opposite way, the price goes up, if there are less Computer who runs the Gladius App than Website whos want to buy the Gladius Token to protect there Website.

Author: Silber
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Don`t misunderstand me, im not her to make FUD. I just thinking through different scenarios.  I see a problem to find the equilibrium of demand and offer.  I have no solution for this problem, but the price (free market) will regulate it. For example: If there is a high demand, because a lot of website owner want to use Gladius, the price will go up and a lot of people will start to make money by running Gladius App on there Computer.

Author: whitehatrigs
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Don't over-think this too much, it's basic supply/demand problem and is present in almost all projects.  Same apply for example to mining, if too many miners are present, it becomes unprofitable and some of them leave. It will be same with Gladius computers.

Author: K33plE4rn1Ng
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Hi,  This project might be interesting. I have a few questions could you help?  - Should I understand that Gladius is privatizing a Tor-like network requiring GLA-miners to host part of the web content of Gladius customers?  I made some calculation on the basis of a small DDOS attack during 2 hours. With Akamai pricing it would have cost +/-850$.  In order to support such a bandwidth Gladius would have needed 13,000 small GLAminers sharing their home connection for a +/- 15,500k‚Ç¨ cash-out/month from miners.  This model seems to be suitable if Gladius faces multiple DDOS attacks per month and if Gladius make their users pay.  Do we know what will the Gladius pricing be for using their protection?

Author: Cosmopo1337
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Hey Gladius team! I have a question about your future product - it's written in the white paper that Gladius Network is going to utilize Ethereum network as a centralized database for storing the proxies and their associated service providers. https://i.imgur.com/kcf8Dex.png Is this a typo? Centralized database on Ethereum network?  Another, more important question is about the rewards for the nodes and pools: You stated that you're going to use Ethereum smart contracts for token transfer. Does this mean that your token is a standard ERC20 token? If so then how are you going to address an average transaction cost of $0.30 in Ethereum network? Additional problem is that to transfer an ERC20 token like yours one needs to have some ETH on their wallet. This poses certain limitations on how your system will work. Please clarify what exactly you have in mind to solve these potential problems and if you do have something why didn't you reflect it in the whitepaper.

Author: cryptohan
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Hello devs,  I've a question. None will underestimate the threat of DDOS attacks so there is a chance this project will be used. But my biggest concern is how you guys will add value to the Gladius token. We earn Gladius tokens with our unused bandwidth but how will the value add??

Author: imtav
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Website owners will need to acquire GLA tokens to pay for DDOS protection services.  'Miners' will then sell these token back, on market, to website owners.  More people that want to use Gladius for DDOS protection, higher the price goes.  More people that want to be DDOS protection providers (miners) will make the market competitive, so in the long run it'll still end up being cheaper than paying cloudflare for example.

Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Here is an answer from Gladius team on Telegram:  As far as that being a typo, good catch should say decentralized.  The transactions are grouped together to lower the overall transaction costs, so pools could choose to pay out daily or based on the total amount earned in that period.  Our solution to that is to allow pools to take deduction from the total amount of GLA payed to a node and instead pay that portion in ether as well for paying for transaction costs.  Do you have more questions?

Author: ico41
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: There is no prohibition in the U.S. for ICO's, as you say, it's not a crime - and certainly not a crime to participate as a contributor.  The current position from the standpoint of the Security and Exchange Commission in the U.S. is uncertain, and that causes a lot of ICO's to reflexively ban United States citizens from participating.  But if the company that is running the ICO does some homework, or seeks legal advice, they find out that as long as the ICO is framed a certain way, there is little chance that the token will be seen from the SEC as a "Security" which would open the ICO to legal trouble, if they didn't register it as such (and almost none do, since it's prohibitively expensive for a startup).  We have seen the SEC actually act against two ICO's (run by the same company) recently, but if you look carefully into it, you will see that the SEC is going after just the right types of people in this case.  So by and large, if you look carefully at ICO's from the perspective of the Howey test, you will find that most of them nowadays, with few exceptions, are being careful to present themselves in a way that will not cause them trouble later.  This particular ICO is a straight-up "utility" token, so they are hewing the right line.

Author: ico41
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: There's no official "test" that guarantees that a token is not a security - but the closest thing we have to one is the "Howey Test" which is the result of a U.S. Supreme Court decision that happened about 70+ years ago, and the SEC seems to have used it ever since when taking action.  There is a really excellent document about this floating around -just type "A Securities Law Framework for Blockchain Tokens" into your favorite search engine and you'll find a PDF.  Great document - but in the back of that doc, you'll find a link to a Google Spreadsheet that actually allows you to conduct your own "Howey Test."  Pretty good stuff.  Of course, no one knows what the SEC is going to do but the SEC, but for us mortals it's a decent enough set of tools to guide us in our decisions, in my opinion.  Essentially, if there is no expectation that the token provides equity in the company or an expected return on investment, and if it confers utility - that is a way to use it on the network - then it's most likely not going to be considered a security.  But check that document out - very interesting stuff...

Import update on the Gladius Token Sale   Private Presale:  After some internal discussions with our team, we have decided to prolong the current funding period, the private presale, by 23 days until November 23rd for a number of reasons (see below).  Public Presale:  After the private sale we have decided to launch a public presale from November 24th to December 30th. This gives you, our community, the chance to get in early with a friendlier bonus structure. We will be releasing the specifics very soon. However, it‚Äôs very likely that we‚Äôll reach the cap much sooner.  Public Sale:  We have decided that in terms of the public sale, it is in everybody‚Äôs best interest to have it pushed back to January 14th. This gives us plenty of time to build our system into a more full fledged product and grow our community to even larger numbers.  https://medium.com/@gladiusio/gladius-presale-has-been-extended-new-public-presale-coming-soon-and-more-50cc657d8d90

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: While the cyber security industry toils to solve the mounting DDoS problem, the solution may lie in blockchain technology.  Spearheading these efforts is a startup called Gladius, who aim to defeat DDoS attacks by creating a network of bandwidth sharing.  The core of all DDoS attacks involves using up the bandwidth of their victims‚Äô servers. Most servers are centralized, with a finite amount of bandwidth, so a sudden flood of excess traffic can fill that space up quickly and lead to disruption of service.  The answer, Gladius believe, lies in simply providing more bandwidth. This is tricky under the current centralized system, so they plan to create a decentralized network of servers that can share bandwidth with one another when the need arises.  The key to this lies in blockchain technology.  https://coinidol.com/ddos-real-menace-but-blockchain-can-help/

Author: gladiusio
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: So a token is the only way you can actually purchase our services. We do this because it lets us create a currency free from any outwardly volatility. Doing this detaches Gladius from direct ties of Bitcoin or Ethereum. It also allows us to predictable manage and model the financial ecosystem. So as our platform grows and more websites buy our services, the value of the coin increases.  However, we are in the talks of ways to actually let businesses directly buy GLA with fiat and fill their account under the hood.

Author: gladiusio
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: We use blockchain primarily as a communication, marketplace, and payment system. The actual protection and CDN works in a very similar way as traditional systems, with the added ability to have nodes anywhere on earth. Because the resources are payed up front (hardware and bandwidth) by the nodes, the overall cost is lowered for a potential customer.

Author: gladiusio
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: This would be facilitated by exchanges, so not to us. Founder have their portion of the tokens locked for the next 18 months, so that will not be sold off.  Currently we are in the process of on-boarding several DNS experts over the next few weeks who have over 20 years of industry experience, and on our advisory board we have two very experienced developers already. The salaries for experts are budgeted, but for privacy reasons we don't want to discuss those in an open forum.  Alex Godwin speaking here, and yes we are on the young side of things. However, this is why have surrounded ourselves with great people in the industry. We currently have marketing, legal, accounting, as well as technical advice all at our disposal. This along with our future hiring plans means we will have a very experienced team.

Author: gladiusio
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Dependent on funding, we will be adding features like Web Application Firewalls, custom page rules, Rate Limiting, and Auto-SSL which would provide more security than a website on its own. In addition to sites getting better security, they will also have improved load times as well. The best of both worlds!  The Gladius token will be the core of the ecosystem. Websites will use it to pay for CDN and DDoS protection services. And nodes will earn these tokens and be able to sell them back. So it's anything but a token for trading.

Author: HanscoLeek
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: My name is Hansco Leek. I have been involved in different ICO's, such as Dcorp and Nexus.Social. Gladius however, is by far one of the most exciting projects I've seen to date. Many people have wondered why there are not any great plans to fight DDos Attacks on the Blockchain...and they are right; This is an area that has yet to be brought to blockchain. On the other hand, it is not very easy to set this up in a way that would ensure instant success. We are confident that we have brought the perfect team together to do this. The combination of technical skilled individuals, marketeers, project managers, advisors and so on is an excellent combination to achieve this goal. Feel free to have a look at the team https://gladius.io/#team  Imagine the possibilities that Gladius will give you.  Renting your computer's spare network bandwidth and start earning tokens is just one aspect of it all. Companies are desperate to find a real effective and cheap solution DDoS Attack protection, which is one of the biggest challenges nowadays! Gladius is bringing the solution for companies, and the opportunity to allow people to earn money in a very easy way by renting out their bandwidth.  Feel free to ask any question you would like to know, our whole team is willing to answer them!

Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: You will provide protection only blockchain based project or anyone from around can take your protection to make secure his business from being down through DDOS attack. How this blockchain will work make secure is there any special requirement to integrate other server into this?

Author: gladiusio
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: To answer that: anyone can use a Gladius pool ton protect themselves, as a website owner implementing it would be no different than any other service. Blockchain is used as a payment as well as a decentralized marketplace of pools. Whenever any communication happens on the blockchain, it is encrypted so it is unreadable to anyone but the recipient.  To implement it as a pool there is nothing more than a few configuration steps and installing the software

Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Before I was involved in Gladius I didn't realise that the DDoS market was so huge. Cloudflare has a market cap over $3.2 billion, that's only one of the companies who fight DDoS attacks. They charges webpages huge fees for protection, by bringing this to the Blockchain it will reduce the fees a lot, everyday there are thousends of new webpages created, who all need protection. Gladius has so much potential and make fighting DDoS attacks very efficient by using the whole network.  Everything is written down in the Whitepaper https://gladius.io/pdf/gladius-whitepaper.pdf

Author: HanscoLeek
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Hi MajikM, thank you for your interest in Gladius. For the longterm, Gladius could grow to be one of the major players in the prevention of DDoS Attacks worldwide. Gladius aims to be cheaper and better than the companies who exist right now. There already is a functioning prototype, which is nearly flawless in nature. Also, the market will increase day by day, and continuous user growth is forecasted, as there is already a strong working relationship with the community who will benefit from it.  I personally would hold my investment in Gladius for the long term as well. Please have a look at the website, and as always, we encourage your feedback!

Author: ZODIAQ
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: The project looks really interesting, but I have some legal questions - what is the country of origin and do you have any escrow agent?

Author: HanscoLeek
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Hi ZODIAQ, thank you for the positive feedback, we are based in the US. Do you mean an escrow agent for the miners and clients from Gladius, or the actual ICO and the funding process? If the question is clear I will forward it to our legal department.

Author: bitcircle
Title: [ANN] TOKEN SALE - Gladius Network [GLA] - DDoS Protection On The Blockchain
Body: Big names are part of the team this showing the good signs about the future of this project. You have any plan to offer some kind of bounty campaign to support this project on different social media and get rewarded. I think this kind of marketing campaign will drive a lot of new investors into this project.
